Challenge #5 

#Set the matrix 
> m3<-matrix(data=c(3,0,1,23,1,2,33,1,1,42,0,1,41,0,2),nrow=5,ncol=3,byrow=TRUE)

#Change the matrix to a data frame
> data.frame(m3)
 X1 X2 X3
1  3  0  1
2 23  1  2
3 33  1  1
4 42  0  1
5 41  0  2

#Rename the data frame to an easier name like df

> df <- data.frame(m3)

#Check the class of each data column by using df[,comumn number]

> df[,2] <- as.logical(df[,2])

> df[,3] <- as.factor(df[,3])

> str(df)
'data.frame':	5 obs. of  3 variables:
 $ X1: num  3 23 33 42 41
 $ X2: logi  TRUE TRUE TRUE TRUE TRUE
 $ X3: Factor w/ 2 levels "1","2": 1 2 1 1 2
